code: import{useState,useEffect}from"react";const useFetch=url=>{const[data,setData]=useState([]);const[error,setError]=useState(null);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(false);useEffect(()=>{const fetchData=async()=>{setLoading(true);try{const res=await fetch(url);if(!res.ok){setError("failed to fetch");alert("failed to fetch");}const result=await res.json();setData(result.data);setLoading(false);}catch(err){setError(err.message);setLoading(false);}};fetchData();},[url]);return{data,error,loading};};export default useFetch;
